DataElement.preferredName: Godin Leisure-Time Exercise Questionnaire 4 How Often Within Week Leisure Time Activity to Produce Sweat Score 3 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's observation during a week, in their leisure time, how often they engaged in activity long enough to produce sweat, using a 3 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Godin Leisure-Time Exercise Questionnaire How Often Within Week Leisure Time Activity to Produce Sweat Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A short self-report questionnaire used to identify the leisure-time physical activities of adults._A question about the frequency of an event or behavior._On the inside; contained in._Any period of seven consecutive days._A question about how often, in their leisure time, an individual engages in regular activity long enough to produce sweat._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A short self-report questionnaire used to identify the leisure-time physical activities of adults.

Concepts.definition: A short self-report questionnaire used to identify the leisure-time physical activities of adults.

Concepts.longName: Leisure Time Activity to Produce Sweat
Concepts.definition: A question about how often, in their leisure time, an individual engages in regular activity long enough to produce sweat.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ReferenceDocuments.name: During a typical 7-Day period
ReferenceDocuments.description: During a typical 7-Day period (a week), in your leisure time, how often do you engage in any regular activity long enough to work up a sweat (heart beats rapidly)?
